DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , control , multi-centered , 12 month post-implantation study . A maximum 15 site enroll total 136 patient . All study participant study device surgically implant . After implant surgery , study participant return clinic evaluation 30 day surgery , three month surgery , six month surgery twelve month surgery . At baseline , three , six twelve month visit patient 's Parkinson 's symptom ability perform daily activity evaluate use number accept assessment tool include Dyskinesia diary , evaluation PD symptom , quality life score patient extension study monitor safety efficacy ANS Libra/Libra Deep Brain Stimulation System . After 1 year study , patient may enter another protocol ( C-06-04 ) continue monitor safety efficacy Libra Deep Brain Stimulation System . Patients may follow additional 4 year . If necessary , patient may continue access investigational device protocol ( C-13-02 ) allow compassionate use access .
